items.question: Is the app easy for my team to use?
items.answer: Absolutely. Procreche was co-designed with early childhood professionals. The interface is intuitive, and a 30-minute training is all it takes to get fully up to speed. Our clients are often surprised by how quickly their teams adopt it.

items.question: Is the children's data security guaranteed?
items.answer: It's our top priority. We use bank-level encryption, and our servers are hosted in Europe. You remain the sole owner of your data, in compliance with GDPR.

items.question: Do I have to make a long-term commitment?
items.answer: No, our subscriptions are flexible with no long-term commitment. You can start with our 14-day free trial, no credit card required, and see for yourself the value we bring.
